short_summary: Chancery expansion of the Consulate General of Canada to the United Arab Emirates, in Dubai
description: This Request for Qualification is being initiated by the Government of Canada through Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development Canada. The solicitation is for Architectural \\u0026 Engineering Services for the Chancery Expansion of the Consulate General of Canada to the United Arab Emirates, in Dubai,
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Architectural & Engineering Services

### Chancery Expansion of the Consulate General of Canada to the United Arab Emirates, in Dubai

#### Solicitation Number: 23-223883

* **Solicitation Date:** September 8, 2022
* **Closing Date:** September 23, 2022, 02:00 PM Eastern Time

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) is issuing a tender for Architectural & Engineering Services to support the Chancery Expansion of the Consulate General of Canada to the United Arab Emirates, in Dubai.

**Project Overview:**
The Government of Canada, through DFATD, plans to undertake an expansion project for the Consulate General of Canada in Dubai. The current chancery is located in the Jumeirah Emirates Towers and has a gross floor area of approximately 892 square meters.

**Services Required:**
The selected consultant will be responsible for providing the following services:

* Preparing working drawings and specifications for the expansion project
* Conducting site visits to ensure compliance with project requirements
* Providing on-site project management support

**Eligibility Criteria:**

* Respondents must be capable of providing services in both English and French
* Ability to participate in on-site project activities in United Arab Emirates

**Important Notes:**

* The selected consultant will be subject to certain restrictions on submitting bids for related construction contracts
* The consultant must comply with the project scope, working drawings, and specifications outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP) document

**Submission Requirements:**

* Interested suppliers must respond to this Request for Qualification (RFQ)
* Prequalified bidders will be invited to submit competitive bids for this work during the RFP stage

Please note that additional documentation, including RFQ, RFP, and bidder qualifications, can be found at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).

**Contracting Entity Information:**

* Title: Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD)
* Address: 125 Sussex Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0G2, Canada

**Contact Information:**

* Brent Hygaard, Procurement Specialist
* Email: realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca
* Phone: 343-203-1331

Deadline to Register Interest: September 22, 2022

Required Qualifications:

* Architectural and Engineering Services
*
